ttp_template:
<group name="allow_dev_key_auto_upgrade_boot_path_buffer_size">
BOOT path-list  : {{BOOT_PATH | ORPHRASE}}
Config file  : {{CONFIG_FILE | ORPHRASE}}
Private Config file : {{PRIV_CONFIG_FILE | ORPHRASE}}
Enable Break  : {{ENABLE_BREAK | ORPHRASE}}
Manual Boot  : {{MANUAL_BOOT | ORPHRASE}}
  buffer size:  {{BUFFER_SIZE | ORPHRASE}}
  via DHCP:  {{CONFIG_DOWNLOAD_DHCP | ORPHRASE}} (next boot: {{CONFIG_DOWNLOAD_DHCP_NEXT_BOOT}}
</group>
cli_content:
BOOT path-list      : flash:c3750e-ipbasek9-mz.150-2.SE11.bin
Config file         : flash:/config.text
Private Config file : flash:/private-config.text
Enable Break        : yes
Manual Boot         : no
Allow Dev Key         : yes
HELPER path-list    : 
Auto upgrade        : yes
Auto upgrade path   :
NVRAM/Config file
      buffer size:   524288
Timeout for Config
          Download:    0 seconds
Config Download
       via DHCP:       disabled (next boot: disabled
